subject: docs: update CLAUDE.md with comprehensive documentation maintenance guide
body:
- Add table-based documentation reference with purpose and update triggers
- Categorize docs into Core (always update), Reference (when relevant),
  Historical (reference only), and Code documentation
- Clarify that documentation should be updated automatically/proactively
- Add instruction to clean up stale entries and obsolete docs
title: update CLAUDE.md with comprehensive documentation maintenance guide
